name: uniswap-v3-radius-deployment
description: Deploy Uniswap V3 to Radius Network using official tools

scripts.setup-anvil: npm run switch-to-anvil && cd uniswap-deploy-v3 && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.check-balance: source .env && node -e "const { ethers } = require('ethers'); const provider = new ethers.providers.JsonRpcProvider(process.env.RPC_URL); const wallet = new ethers.Wallet(process.env.DEPLOYER_KEY, provider); wallet.getBalance().then(b => { const balance = ethers.utils.formatEther(b); console.log('Balance:', balance, 'ETH'); if (parseFloat(balance) < 0.5) { console.log('‚ö†Ô∏è  WARNING: Low balance! You may need more ETH for deployment.'); } else { console.log('‚úÖ Sufficient balance for deployment'); } }).catch(err => console.error('Error:', err.message));"
scripts.deploy: cd uniswap-deploy-v3 && source ../.env && npx tsx index.ts --private-key "$DEPLOYER_KEY" --json-rpc "$RPC_URL" --weth9-address "$WETH9_ADDRESS" --native-currency-label "$NATIVE_CURRENCY_LABEL" --owner-address "$DEPLOYER_ADDRESS" --gas-price 2 --confirmations 2 --state "../uniswap-v3-deployment-state.json"
scripts.deploy-base-sepolia: cd uniswap-deploy-v3 && source ../.env && npx tsx index.ts --private-key "$DEPLOYER_KEY" --json-rpc "$RPC_URL" --weth9-address "$WETH9_ADDRESS" --native-currency-label "$NATIVE_CURRENCY_LABEL" --owner-address "$DEPLOYER_ADDRESS" --gas-price 2 --confirmations 2 --state "../uniswap-v3-deployment-state.json"
scripts.deploy-anvil: cd uniswap-deploy-v3 && source ../.env && npx tsx index.ts --private-key "$DEPLOYER_KEY" --json-rpc "$RPC_URL" --weth9-address "$WETH9_ADDRESS" --native-currency-label "$NATIVE_CURRENCY_LABEL" --owner-address "$DEPLOYER_ADDRESS" --gas-price 20 --confirmations 1 --state "../uniswap-v3-deployment-state.json"
scripts.verify-deployment: source .env && node -e "const { ethers } = require('ethers'); const provider = new ethers.providers.JsonRpcProvider(process.env.RPC_URL); const factoryAbi = ['function owner() view returns (address)']; const factory = new ethers.Contract(process.env.FACTORY_ADDRESS, factoryAbi, provider); factory.owner().then(owner => { console.log('‚úÖ Factory Owner:', owner); console.log('üéâ Deployment verified successfully!'); }).catch(err => console.error('‚ùå Verification failed:', err.message));"
